inputs.name: items
inputs.text: An hierarchical array of nav entries.

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.text: A prefix for the id of child routes.

inputs.name: filterPattern
inputs.text: A string to match against all nav entries.

inputs.name: labelFormatter
inputs.text: A function to format each nav entry label.

inputs.name: variant
inputs.text: Classes applied to the component to customize it.

inputs.name: activateAncestors
inputs.text: Whether active link's ancestors also be active.

inputs.name: treeAriaLabelledBy
inputs.text:
The ID of the element that labels the purpose of the nav-tree.
If there is no visible text labeling the nav-tree, use aria-label instead.
When both attributes are defined, aria-labelledby takes precedence.

inputs.name: treeAriaLabel
inputs.text:
Defines a string that labels the purpose of the nav-tree.
If there is a visible text labeling the nav-tree, use aria-labelledby instead.
When both attributes are defined, aria-labelledby takes precedence.

api.name: ObNavTreeItemModel
api.usage: The model of a nav tree item

variables.name: label
variables.text: Label to render in the nav item

variables.name: labelParams
variables.text: Parameters to render in the label in the nav item

variables.name: items
variables.text: Child items under the nav item

variables.name: parent
variables.text: Parent item of the nav item

variables.name: path
variables.text: Where to navigate to when clicking nav item, see routerLink docs under https://angular.io/api/router/RouterLink

variables.name: fragment
variables.text: Where to navigate to when clicking nav item, see fragment docs under https://angular.io/api/router/RouterLink

variables.name: queryParams
variables.text: Where to navigate to when clicking nav item, see queryParams docs under https://angular.io/api/router/RouterLink
